item.title: Hands-on gdb
item.author: houze.zhang@etu.utc.fr (Zane_ZHANG)
item.description: Background I read this blog when I was doing CMU15445-Project0, mainly providing a hands-on way to learn gdb. This post is a brief summary for this blog, appending my bug-free code for the example source code. Highlights gdb [prog_name] is used to load program waited to be debugged into gdb. In the gdb prompt, we can run prog or quit gdb. break [function name] will set breakpoint at certain function.
